articles.description: We are now under 50 days away from the release of Lightfall, and I’m sure there’s about to be a full court press of information released relating to the upcoming expansion and subsequent season. But that’s the good news, and at some point, I’m going to need B…

articles.author: Joe Fedewa
articles.title: What’s New in Chrome 109, Arriving Today - How-To Geek
articles.description: Google is kicking off the new year with a fresh version of the Chrome browser. Chrome 109—releasing on January 10, 2023—includes a new Secure Payment Confirmation for Android, Material You support on the desktop, and video conferencing tools.
